Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Suresh Pokhrel
Reviews.Content: It is awesome camera. I would like to recommend my friends. It has excellent features of MP and optical zoom.

Reviews.Title: Took too long to focus
Reviews.Author: Larry F "Larry F"
Reviews.Content: I didn't have this camera long enough to explore its features.  I received it at work and tried it out.  The camera took at least 2 - 3 seconds to focus.  In this amount of time, you can miss quite a few shots. I returned it the next day.  In the camera's defense, I may have simply received a defective unit.

ProductInfo.Features:
Manual exposure with simple operation of aperture control and shutter speed control
16.1 megapixel, Optical Image Stabilization, OIS, Panorama Shot for dynamic images, creative control with 10 effects
HD Video (1280 x 720) in Motion JPEG, iA Mode, 3-Inch LCD
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix LZ30 16.1MP Digital Camera with 35x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black)
